Game Lib React, Redux

← Back

An application informing the user about Upcoming, Popular and Newest Games.

GameLib is created with React, uses games info from the API https://api.rawg.io/api/games .

Libraries, Frameworks

React - library for building user interfaces, Redux

Other Used Libraries

styled-components, framer-motion

redux-thunk, axios, dotenv

General functionality

Get games from the API with axios

Get current game date and format date

Sort 10 loaded games by date

General functionality

Manage app store with Redux, redux-thunk

Use styled-components, framer-motion for UI

Organize layout with CSS grid
